document_data.name: Ulcrimmon Alskayl
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulcrimmon Alskayl''' was a hunter of the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|21}}
document_data.Relationships: His father, [[Skuulaghh Alskayl]], was infamous for his hedonism and had lots of children born in wedlock and lots of bastards born out of it, leaving Ulcrimmon with many siblings and step-siblings. They formed a clan of hunters in Maskyr's Eye by around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was coarse of manners and shady of character.
